c-1: ^Thach Sanh: I'm sorry! I should've came sooner!

g-3: ^Villager: Everyone died!... I thought that we could fight back!
g-4: ^Villager: But a giant tiger show up, it's killed everyone that he can find! We can't do anything against that such a power!
g-5: ^Thach Sanh: Maybe someone is still alive! I can save them if I get to the village!
^Villager: No, you can't. You're going to get yourself killed!

c-0: ^Thach Sanh: Maybe! But I can't just run away!
c-1: ^Thach Sanh: I'm not afraid of danger.
g-1: ^Thach Sanh: Be safe! We may meet again!
